item.title: In Photos: An Earthquake Rocks Myanmar and Thailand
item.description: The 7.7-magnitude quake caused widespread damage in a country already in chaos because of civil war.

item.title: What We Know About the Earthquake in Myanmar
item.description: More than 140 people were reported dead in Myanmar, and the earthquake was felt across Southeast Asia.

item.title: Trump Deportation Fight Reaches Supreme Court
item.description: The Trump administration asked the justices to allow it to use a wartime law to continue deportations of Venezuelans with little or no due process.

item.title: Inflation Remained Sticky Ahead of Trump’s Escalating Trade War, PCE Data Shows
item.description: The Federal Reserve’s preferred inflation measure showed underlying price pressures persisting in February, as inflation-adjusted spending stayed mute...

item.title: They Loved Their Teslas. Now They’re Too Embarrassed to Drive Them.
item.description: Fury at Elon Musk emerges as vandalism, protest and buyer’s remorse.
